document_data.caption: Khemal Serist, Cultist of the Shattered Peak.
document_data.name: Khemal Serist
document_data.mainbody:
{{Quote|''The pride of wizards and arcanists nearly doomed Faer√ªn once. Never again.''|Khemal Serist, Cultist of the Shattered Peak}}
'''Khemal Serist''' was a member of the [[Cult of the Shattered Peak]].
document_data.Personality: Khemal preferred distracting seekers of [[Netherese]] lore rather than killing them outright. He was flexible in his tactics.
document_data.History: Khemal rose quickly within the cult after proving his skill and effectiveness over several missions.
